OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart finally meets Nightsong. If Shadowheart is an Avatar, the player has the option to kill or free Nightsong. Shar will encourage the player to kill Nightsong using the Spear of Night.If the player is controlling a companion Shadowheart, Shadowheart will always choose to kill Nightsong.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM.how_to_trigger: 1.Talk to Nightsong while controlling Shadowheart - either as a companion or an Avatar2. Talk to Nightsong while Shadowheart is a companion

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_20.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_20.text: Balthazar has drawn his final rancid breath. A pity it was not my hand that brought it about. Instead, it was you.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.InternalNodeContext: This node if Balthazar was attacked in a scene just before this one.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_138.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_138.text: You, who have come to find the wicked favour of your goddess. Go on - show me your dagger, your sword, your knife.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_138.context: CinematicNodeContext: On 'go on' she points at SH, triggering the magical hands that keep her held in place.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_65.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_65.text: *Your worship of Lady Shar, out in the open at last. You managed to keep the secret from those around you for so long... but no more.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_22.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_22.text: What have you done? The spear, foolish child - you don't have the spear!
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart flinches at the sound of Shar's angry voiceNodeContext: Wrathful goddess chastising her follower's error

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_173.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_173.text: There is much your mistress does not tell you - my death will come at a terrible price. One that you will not grasp until it is too late.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_191.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_191.text: Do you know what I am, little assassin? For I know you - a lost child, frightened by wolves in the dark.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_82.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_82.text: Much has been promised to you, hasn't it? But what has been taken from you? What do you know of your own heart - your own life?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_190.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_190.text: I sense more in you than you know. Why?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_127.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_127.text: You are an enemy to the Lady of Loss. Nothing else matters.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_63.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_63.text: I am Dame Aylin. Out of this hellish realm I carry my sword by the blessing of my mother, Selûne.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_171.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_171.text: The very sight of me would disgust you if you were a true Sharran. But you, perhaps, are something more.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_180.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_180.text: You don't frighten me. Now keep out of my head.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_141.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_141.text: Look at me. I am at your mercy. To frighten you would only hasten my demise.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_24.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_24.text: I sense something in you, assassin. Something your Dark Lady fears.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_67.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_67.text: Do not listen, Shadowheart. She seeks to distract, to confuse, to prolong her ugly existence and deny you your destiny. Shut out her words.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart flinches slightly at the sound of Shar's voiceNodeContext: Reassuring and soothing, yet with an edge beneath the surface. (urging Shadowheart to sacrifice someone)

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_39.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_39.text: Shar speaks now, doesn't she? Dribbles the poison of oblivion in the shell of your ear? I do not hear her words, but I sense her rage.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks down at her right hand, which glows like it does when her incurable wound flares - only this time she doesn't react to any pain. The Spear of Night materialises in her palm like a dark mirage.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_81.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_81.text: If I spare you, you'll tell me what you know?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_109.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_109.text: You must do more than spare me. You must free me.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_76.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_76.text: Ketheric Thorm - once a servant of your goddess, now a faithless wretch - has used me to make himself immortal for a hundred years.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_110.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_110.text: Free me  - lay a hand upon me in friendship. I will end him - and I will lay your path at your feet. Then, you must walk it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_156.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_156.text: Enough. Close your heart to her craven words. Strike! Strike and rise!

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_157.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_157.text: There, I feel her again. Why does she fear truth more than I fear death?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_196.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart casts the spear away.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_164.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_164.text: Your past is not yet lost. Your future is not yet fixed.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_187.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_187.text: Lay a hand on me in friendship, not-quite-Sharran, and I will fight the battle that has been waiting for me this last century. Then - oh then, we will have much to discuss.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_187.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong kneels, Shadowheart lays a hand on her shoulder

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_78.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_78.text: End her words with the Spear of Night.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart thrusts the spear forward, right into Nightsong's heart. Her hands and  forearms are coated in Nightsong's blood. She releases the spear, leaving it protruding from Nightsong's torso.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_132.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_132.text: There it is. True death, at last. You are Shar's child after all. And I am... I am...
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_132.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong falls, dead. Shadowheart exhales, trembling.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_21.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_21.text: It is done. You have proven yourself. You have answered my highest calling. My Chosen. My Warrior. My Dark Justiciar.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_136.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_136.text: No more hiding. Let me show you - let all see how you have served me, Shadowheart. And how you have been rewarded.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_96.context: CinematicNodeContext: A black sphere suddenly envelopes Shadowheart. She finds herself in a strange, dark nowhere. A black disc with a fringe of purple glow, almost like an eclipse, appears before her, forming Shar's symbol. Just barely visible within the disc is what appear to be a figure, arms outstretched to the sides, as if suspended from the disc itself. The wound on Shadowheart's hand glows - only this time, she does not wince in pain. The wild, flickering magic slows and coalesces into a black magic sphere balanced upon her hand. She stares at it with awe and a little trepidation.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_36.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_36.text: Your pain is now your power. Wield it true.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_152.context: CinematicNodeContext: The dark sphere in Shadowheart's hand expands, engulfing her, filling the entire space with darkness. Then it recedes, revealing Shadowheart, transformed. Her hair has changed - more elaborate now, threaded with purple-tinged metals. She wears the full armour of a Dark Justiciar, but no dusty relic - an immaculate, dark metal. The sphere reduces down in size, controlled in her palm.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_124.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_124.text: My church must be cleansed. You shall be my instrument in ridding it of the impure, then you shall take up the mantle as its new leader.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_97.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_97.text: First, punish the traitor, Ketheric Thorm. He shunned my embrace. He let my armies be slaughtered. He used my domain to safeguard his wretched life.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_14.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_14.text: But now, without the Nightsong, he is vulnerable. End him, in my name, Shadowheart. Let him see you in your splendour, before you shut his eyes forever.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_143.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_143.text: Once he is vanquished, Baldur's Gate awaits. Your holy work will continue there, where you first learned of my embrace. Take up my spear again and go forth. Let the cleansing begin.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_183.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_183.text: *Lady Shar's parting words echo with resurgent power - your sacrifice of the Nightsong has strengthened her. Her grip tightens on the lands. The Selûnite enclave at haven shall be no more...*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_183.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gazes upwards, as if towards the surface world high above.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_48.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_48.text: If I spare you, you'll tell me what you know?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_160.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_160.text: You must do more than spare me. You must free me.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_105.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_105.text: Ketheric Thorm - once a servant of your goddess, now a faithless wretch - has used me to make himself immortal for a hundred years.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_54.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_54.text: Free me  - lay a hand upon me in friendship. I will end him - and I will lay your path at your feet. Then, you must walk it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_35.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_35.text: Enough. Close your heart to her. She only seeks to hold you back. Make the sacrifice. Do it for me, Shadowheart.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_35.context: NodeContext: Imploring and soothing, yet with an edge beneath the surface. (urging Shadowheart to sacrifice someone)

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_189.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_189.text: There, I feel her again. Why does she fear truth more than I fear death?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_71.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_71.text: Your past is not yet lost. Your future is not yet fixed.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_184.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_184.text: Lay a hand on me in friendship, not-quite-Sharran, and I will fight the battle that has been waiting for me this last century. Then - oh then, we will have much to discuss.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_184.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong kneels, Shadowheart lays a hand on her shoulder

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_0.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_0.text: You must die. Shar wills it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_15.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_15.text: You cannot. You will not. Without your spear, you are as a lamb before a lion.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_60.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_60.text: Lay your hand on me - free me from this prison - and you will have proven me most wrong.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong kneels, Shadowheart lays a hand on her shoulder

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_62.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_62.text: My spear, child - pierce her heart, and become my sword hand. My Dark Justiciar.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_89.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_89.text: Well, well, well. What's that I sense? A spear intended for my heart. Empowered by your goddess, aye - empowered to kill the child of a god.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slight cock of her head, as if sensing something that is not yet visible.NodeContext: Slight cock of her head, as if sensing something that is not yet visible.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_25.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_25.text: At last. What took you so long, little Sharran?
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_37.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_37.text: I have felt you coming. The first in a century.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_139.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_139.text: You, who have come to seek the praise of your wicked goddess. You, who have come to drive a dagger through my heart.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_139.context: CinematicNodeContext: She continues pacing, watching her feet, but slams her open palm against her heart.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_108.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_108.text: Not a dagger - a spear. My Lady Shar's spear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_4.text: It is my Lady Shar's will. You should be honoured to be a part of her plan - I know I am.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_179.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_179.text: Her fate is mine to seal. Let me handle this.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_155.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_155.text: The fate you seal is your own. To be a Dark Justiciar is to turn your heart from everything but loss. You will know no love, no joy - only servitude.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_79.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_79.text: Until, of course, your mistress inevitably discards you. And there is much she does not tell you - a terrible blood price that may extend beyond my own death.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_194.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_194.text: *You feel Shadowheart bristling - this is important to her. But your bond is strong. You may yet be able to sway her from the path of duty to the path of light.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_165.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_165.text: *You feel Shadowheart bristling - this is important to her. You may yet have the chance to dissuade her from doing her duty, but not without risk to your bond.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_13.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_13.text: *You feel Shadowheart bristling - this is important to her. Any attempts to dissuade her from doing her duty will be a damning blow to your bond.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_1.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_1.text: *And Nightsong is not blind to your conflict. Behind that raging heart is the restless beat of one who knows too well that her fate hangs in the balance.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_170.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_170.text: Is this truly what you want?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_98.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_98.text: I... yes, I think so. My whole life's been leading to this. No turning back now.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_84.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_84.text: Of course, why wouldn't it be? This is my purpose.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_85.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_85.text: If you knew me, you would not even ask. It is what my Lady wants - I'm just her servant.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_29.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_29.text: Choose your own way, Shadowheart. You cannot allow your goddess to control you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_38.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_38.text: All right, fine. Do as you will.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_46.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_46.text: No, it's not. Your life is whatever you make it - don't give up on yourself.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks down at her right hand, which glows like it does when her incurable wound flares - only this time she doesn't react to any pain. The Spear of Night materialises in her palm like a dark mirage.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pauses, torn, then flings the Spear of Night away.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_181.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_181.text: I can't believe I did that - Shar will disown me. Now I'm truly lost...
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_181.context: NodeContext: 'WTF did I just do?' adrenaline/shock

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_122.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_122.text: You were already lost, little warrior. A lost child, frightened by wolves.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_51.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_51.text: Find a new purpose then. My mind is set.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_151.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_151.text: If I have to step over your corpse to fulfil what Lady Shar asks of me, so be it. Your choice.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_59.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_59.text: All right. You have my support.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_56.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_56.text: And what do you propose to do, little Sharran? With what weapon would you take the life of an immortal?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_174.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_174.text: Well, well, well. What's that I sense? A spear intended for my heart. Empowered by your goddess, aye - empowered to kill the child of a god.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_174.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slight cock of her head, as if sensing something that is not yet visible.NodeContext: Slight cock of her head, as if sensing something that is not yet visible.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_90.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_90.text: Do you know what I am, little assassin? For I know you - a lost child, frightened by wolves in the dark.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_140.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_140.context: NodeContext: Thrown. Nightsong has seemingly referred to SH's childhood trauma

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_3.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_3.text: Much has been promised to you, hasn't it? But what has been taken from you? What do you know of your own heart - your own life?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_167.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_167.text: I sense more in you than you know.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_148.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_148.text: I... what do you think? What should I do?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_17.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_17.text: This is your choice. I can't make it for you.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_17.context: InternalNodeContext: This node lets SH make the choice herself. High-approval towards the player defaults to sparing Nightsong

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_26.text: I... I can't believe I just did that. Lady Shar will disown me... what will happen to me?
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_26.context: NodeContext: 'WTF did I just do?' adrenaline/shock

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_161.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_161.text: Not what will happen - what will you do. Your past is not yet lost. Your future is not yet fixed.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_91.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_91.text: Lay a hand on me in friendship, not-quite-Sharran, and I will fight the battle that has been waiting for me this last century. Then - oh then, we will have much to discuss.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong kneels, Shadowheart lays a hand on her shoulder

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_102.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_102.text: This is your choice. I can't make it for you.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_102.context: InternalNodeContext: This node lets SH make the choice herself. Low--approval towards the player defaults to killing Nightsong

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_198.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_198.text: Let her live. Shar will never stop asking sacrifices of you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_106.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_106.text: Whatever you think you know of me won't matter, once I become whom I'm meant to be.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_19.text: Whatever you think you know of me won't matter, once I become whom I'm meant to be.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_16.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_16.text: Whatever you think you know of me won't matter, once I become whom I'm meant to be.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_116.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_116.text: Kill her. Let's finish this ritual.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart thrusts the spear forward, right into Nightsong's heart. Her hands and  forearms are coated in Nightsong's blood. She releases the spear, leaving it protruding from Nightsong's torso.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_74.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_74.text: There it is. True death, at last. You are Shar's child after all. And I am... I am...
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong falls, dead. The spear protrudes upwards from her corpse. Shadowheart exhales, trembling.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_104.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_104.text: It is done. You have proven yourself. You have answered my highest calling. My Chosen. My Warrior. My Dark Justiciar.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_80.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_80.text: No more hiding. Let me show you - let all see how you have served me, Shadowheart. And how you have been rewarded.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: A black sphere suddenly envelopes Shadowheart. She finds herself in a strange, dark nowhere. A black disc with a fringe of purple glow, almost like an eclipse, appears before her, forming Shar's symbol. Just barely visible within the disc is what appear to be a figure, arms outstretched to the sides, as if suspended from the disc itself.The wound on Shadowheart's hand glows as Shar speaks to her - only this time, she does not wince in pain. The wild, flickering magic slows and coalesces into a black magic sphere balanced upon her hand. She stares at it with awe and a little trepidation.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_162.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_162.text: Your pain is now your power. Wield it true.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_150.context: CinematicNodeContext: The dark sphere in Shadowheart's hand expands, engulfing her, filling the entire space with darkness. Then it recedes, revealing Shadowheart, transformed. Her hair has changed - more elaborate now, threaded with purple-tinged metals. She wears the full armour of a Dark Justiciar, but no dusty relic - an immaculate, dark metal. The sphere reduces down in size, controlled in her palm.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_86.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_86.text: My church must be cleansed. You shall be my instrument in ridding it of the impure, then you shall take up the mantle as its new leader.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_57.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_57.text: First, hunt down the traitor, Ketheric Thorm. He shunned my embrace. He let my armies be slaughtered. He used my domain to safeguard his wretched life.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_142.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_142.text: But now, without the Nightsong, he is vulnerable. End him, in my name, Shadowheart. Let him see you in your splendour, before you shut his eyes forever.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_77.speaker: Shar
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_77.text: Once he is vanquished, Baldur's Gate awaits. Your holy work will continue there, where you first learned of my embrace. Take up my spear again and go forth. Let the cleansing begin.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The vision scene dissolves as Shar's voice fades

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_30.text: Finally! Through me her will is enacted. Her shadows strengthen and the darkness takes all. I am her Chosen!
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gazing upwards with wonder torwards the surfaceNodeContext: Awestruck, gazing upwards. Experiencing a sort of religious ectasy/insight into her goddess's next move.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_10.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_10.text: You cannot. You will not. Without your spear, you are as a lamb before a lion.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_144.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_144.text: Lay your hand on me - free me from this prison - and you will have proven me most wrong.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_144.context: CinematicNodeContext: Nightsong kneels, Shadowheart lays a hand on her shoulder

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_87.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_87.text: She knows something about you. Spare her, and see what she has to say.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_111.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_111.text: Don't do it, Shadowheart. Don't kill her - you'll regret it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_193.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_193.text: Don't do it, Shadowheart. Don't kill her - you'll regret it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_168.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_168.text: Don't do it, Shadowheart. Don't kill her - you'll regret it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_146.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_146.text: She knows something about you. Spare her, and see what she has to say.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_188.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_188.text: This is wrong... but I can't afford to lose you. Do what you must.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_43.text: I didn't want to fight. I wanted you to see reason. A foolish notion, clearly.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_43.context: NodeContext: Angry and resigned. Attacks the player immediately afterwards

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_135.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_135.text: Cannot allow...? This is my mistress' will - my life's purpose!

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_70.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_70.text: Balthazar has drawn his final rancid breath. A pity it was not my hand that brought it about. Instead, it was you.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_100.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_100.text: At last. What took you so long, little Sharran?
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_45.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_45.text: You cannot. You will not. Without your spear, you are as a lamb before a lion.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_120.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_120.text: I've... I've failed. Lady Shar will disown me... what will happen to me?
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_120.context: NodeContext: Distraught. Believes she's failed her life's goal

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_195.speaker: Nightsong
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_195.text: I have felt you coming, Sharran. The first in a century.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_COM_195.context: CinematicNodeContext: She paces the narrow cage where she's kept, like a tiger. She looks down as she paces, not yet deigning to make eye contact.
